metadata.title: Wood Staining & Restoration Montreal | Topdeck
metadata.description: Montreal's deck and fence staining specialists. We wash, sand, and stain your wood back to life — RBQ licensed, 250+ projects completed. Free quotes.

hero.description: Montreal's weather is tough on wood. We wash, sand, and stain to keep it protected and looking its best.

servicesPreview.title: Our 3-Step Process
servicesPreview.description: We bring your outdoor wood back to life using professional-grade equipment and our proven restoration method.

wash.title: Wash
wash.description: Deep pressure washing removes years of dirt, mold, and grime.

sand.title: Sand
sand.description: Smooth sanding opens wood pores for optimal stain absorption.

stain.title: Stain
stain.description: Premium stains penetrate deep to protect and beautify your wood.

whyChooseUs.subtitle: THE TOPDECK DIFFERENCE
whyChooseUs.title: Specialized Exterior Wood Restoration
whyChooseUs.description: We specialize in one thing: restoring outdoor wood. Professional-grade equipment, premium products, and a proven process that delivers every time.

quality.title: Professional Prep & Products
quality.description: We use heavy-duty equipment to properly prepare your wood, followed by the right stains tailored to your specific project. This ensures your outdoor space gets exactly what it needs to stay protected.

onTime.title: Efficient & Effective Work
onTime.description: We value your time as much as your property. Our team works efficiently to restore your wood to a high standard, delivering excellent results without dragging out the timeline or cutting corners.

experience.title: RBQ Licensed & Insured
experience.description: We hold a valid RBQ license and carry $2 million in liability insurance, providing you with complete peace of mind that your home and property are fully protected from start to finish.

whyChooseUs.servingAreas: Proudly serving Montreal, Laval, Longueuil, and surrounding areas

ctaBanner.title: Ready to Restore Your Wood?
ctaBanner.description: Get a free, personalized quote for your project. We'll assess your needs and recommend the best approach for your wood.

servicesPage.heroDescription: Expert wood restoration utilizing heavy-duty equipment and our proven 3-step process
servicesPage.processDescription: Every project follows the same proven method — wash, sand, stain — for consistent, beautiful results.

washing.title: Pressure Washing
washing.description: We start with a thorough deep clean using professional-grade pressure washers. This strips away years of dirt, grime, mold, and mildew, preparing a clean surface for sanding.

sanding.title: Sanding
sanding.description: Once dry, we sand the entire surface with professional-grade sanders to create the perfect canvas for staining. This smooths rough spots, opens the wood grain, and ensures optimal stain absorption.
details: Prepares the wood texture for staining
Opens wood pores for better absorption
Removes old flaking stain or coatings

staining.title: Staining
staining.description: The final step is applying premium-quality stain that penetrates deep into the wood grain. Our stains protect against UV damage, moisture, and wear while bringing out the natural character of your wood.

servicesPage.surfacesDescription: We stain and restore all types of outdoor wood surfaces.

decks.title: Decks & Patios
decks.description: Wash, sand, and stain your deck back to life.

fences.title: Fences & Gates
fences.description: A fresh stain protects your fence and gives it a clean, uniform look.

railings.title: Railings & Stairs
railings.description: Stained railings look sharp and hold up against the elements.

pergolas.title: Pergolas & Gazebos
pergolas.description: Restore and protect your pergola or gazebo with a professional stain job.

stainSelector.title: Choose Your Stain
stainSelector.subtitle: Explore the stain options available for your deck's condition.

categories.semiTransparentDescription: Reveals the wood's natural grain and texture while providing colour enhancement and lasting UV protection. Available in select natural tint colours.
categories.solidDescription: Delivers complete, uniform coverage with rich colour — concealing imperfections while protecting the wood beneath. Available in hundreds of colours.

productTypes.hybridOilDescription: A hybrid semi-transparent formula that enhances the wood's natural colour with more uniform coverage than traditional semi-transparent stains.
productTypes.penetratingOilDescription: Premium oil-based penetrating stains offering the most natural finish — highlighting the wood's grain and character while providing a natural tint.

stainSelector.solidNote: Many more colours are available — ask us about our full selection.
